data.comment: The match has started, with Udinese kicking-off.
Ball safe as Udinese is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 1, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
Francesco Fourneau awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Francesco Fourneau signals a throw-in for Fiorentina, close to Udinese's area.
Corner awarded to Fiorentina.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Udinese's half?
In the minute 5, Free kick Fiorentina.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
In the minute 7, Fiorentina needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Udinese.
In the minute 8, Udinese drive upfield and Kevin Lasagna gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Fiorentina defender.
Throw-in for Udinese close to the penalty box.
Goal! Fiorentina have got their heads in front thanks to a Gaetano Castrovilli strike.
In the minute 11, Cristiano Biraghi instrumental with a fine assist.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Udinese's half.
Fiorentina's Giacomo Bonaventura is whistled for offside at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 13, Ball goes out of play for a Udinese goal kick.
Throw-in high up the field for Udinese in Florence.
Jose Callejon of Fiorentina gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 17, Udinese have a goal kick.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fiorentina to take a throw-in in Udinese territory.
In the minute 20, Fiorentina have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
Udinese will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Fiorentina.
Nikola Milenkovic scores with a header and the home team increase their lead to 2-0.
In the minute 21, That's a fine assist from Gaetano Castrovilli.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
In the minute 25, Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 28, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Free kick for Fiorentina in the half of Udinese.
Free kick Udinese.
In the minute 33, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Udinese's Rodrigo De Paul has run offside.
In Florence, Roberto Pereyra of Udinese is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 34, Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Udinese.
Udinese are coming forward and Thomas Ouwejan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 35, Francesco Fourneau awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Throw-in for Udinese in their own half.
Udinese pushes forward through Kevin Lasagna, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 36, Rodrigo De Paul (Udinese) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Giuseppe Iachini is making the team's first substitution at Stadio Artemio Franchi with Lucas Martinez replacing German Pezzella.
In the minute 40, In Florence Udinese's Kevin Lasagna is caught offside.
Throw-in Udinese.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Udinese throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
In the minute 41, Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Tolgay Arslan is booked for the away team.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 43, Stefano Okaka (Udinese) heads in to reduce the deficit. The score is now 2-1.
Great play from Rodrigo De Paul to set up the goal.
Can Fiorentina get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Udinese's half?
In the minute 45, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Udinese just outside Fiorentina's area.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Rodrigo Becao for the away team is judged to be offside.
In the minute 45, Udinese awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half has come to a close in Florence.
The ref has blown to start the second-half. Fiorentina kick-off.
In the minute 46, Throw-in for Fiorentina in the half of Udinese.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 47, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Udinese have a goal kick.
In the minute 49, Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Fiorentina in their own half.
Udinese awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
In the minute 51, Sebastien De Maio (Udinese) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
Francesco Fourneau signals a Fiorentina throw-in in Udinese's half.
In the minute 51, Fiorentina take a comfortable 3-1 lead thanks to Gaetano Castrovilli.
Cristiano Biraghi with an assist there.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
In the minute 54, Francesco Fourneau blows against Udinese's Stefano Okaka for offside.
Luca Gotti (Udinese) is making a first substitution, with Walace replacing Tolgay Arslan.
The away team have replaced Thomas Ouwejan with Ignacio Pussetto. This is the second substitution made today by Luca Gotti.
In the minute 56, Ball safe as Fiorentina is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Udinese get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fiorentina's half?
Throw-in for Udinese in the half of Fiorentina.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Sebastien De Maio (Udinese) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Udinese capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Fiorentina's half?
In the minute 60, Free kick in a good position for Udinese!
Stefano Okaka (Udinese) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Udinese have been awarded a corner by Francesco Fourneau.
In the minute 62, Udinese's Roberto Pereyra gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Fiorentina goal kick.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Udinese.
In the minute 63, Gaetano Castrovilli (Fiorentina) has received a yellow card from Francesco Fourneau.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Ignacio Pussetto for Udinese who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Udinese's Ignacio Pussetto is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Udinese in the half of Fiorentina.
In the minute 66, Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
The home team replace Jose Callejon with Patrick Cutrone.
Christian Kouame is replacing Dusan Vlahovic for the home team.
Udinese's Ignacio Pussetto has been booked in Florence.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 68, Ignacio Pussetto for the away team is judged to be offside.
In Florence a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Francesco Fourneau awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
Pol Lirola for Fiorentina is back on the field again.
In the minute 70, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Pol Lirola.
Udinese make their third substitution with Gerard Deulofeu replacing Kevin Lasagna.
In the minute 71, Francesco Fourneau signals a Udinese throw-in in Fiorentina's half.
Goal kick for Fiorentina at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Gerard Deulofeu for Udinese drives towards goal at Stadio Artemio Franchi. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Udinese.
Samir's header is off-target for Udinese.
Francesco Fourneau awards Fiorentina a goal kick.
In the minute 76, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Pol Lirola is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Fiorentina awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 79, Pol Lirola is back on his feet again.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Fiorentina.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
Pol Lirola, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Lorenzo Venuti is the substitute for Fiorentina.
In the minute 80, Erick Pulgar is on a sub for Giacomo Bonaventura for Fiorentina.
Throw-in Udinese.
In the minute 82, Francesco Fourneau blows against Udinese's Ignacio Pussetto for offside.
Udinese make their fourth substitution with Fernando Forestieri replacing Roberto Pereyra.
Kevin Bonifazi is replacing Samir for Udinese at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
In the minute 83, Free kick for Udinese in their own half.
Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Udinese push forward at Stadio Artemio Franchi and Walace gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fiorentina defence.
In the minute 84, Free kick for Fiorentina in their own half.
Udinese to take a throw-in in Fiorentina territory.
Free kick Fiorentina.
In the minute 85, Rodrigo Becao (Udinese) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-2 through a header from Stefano Okaka.
Great play from Fernando Forestieri to set up the goal.
In the minute 87, In Florence Udinese's Ignacio Pussetto is caught offside.
Throw-in for Fiorentina close to the penalty box.
Fiorentina have a dangerous throw-in.
Francesco Fourneau awards the home team a throw-in.
Francesco Fourneau signals a free kick to Udinese in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Fiorentina needs to be cautious. Udinese have an attacking throw-in.
Francesco Fourneau signals a throw-in for Udinese, close to Fiorentina's area.
Udinese are pushing forward but Rodrigo De Paul's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Florence.
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Can Fiorentina capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Udinese's half?
Throw-in for Fiorentina in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Fiorentina in Florence.
Throw-in for Udinese at Stadio Artemio Franchi.
Fiorentina have a goal kick.
That's full-time at Stadio Artemio Franchi. The final score is 3-2.
